titleStmt.title: The funerall-sermon of Mr. Miles Pinckeney alias Thomas Carre confessour to the English canonesses regulars of the holly Order of S. Augustin established in Paris. / Preached to the sayd religious at his solemn funeralls by his successour E.L.
titleStmt.author: Lutton, Edward, 1637 or 8-1713.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
